sections.heading: 1250.1 through 1250.16 of this title shall constitute a part of the Oklahoma Insurance Code and shall be known and may be cited as the "Unfair Claims Settlement Practices Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1986, c. 315, ยง 5, emerg. eff. June 24, 1986. Amended by Laws 1994, c. 342, ยง 1, eff. Sept. 1, 1994. Renumbere
